name: St√©phane
message:
What???
You are leaving such a wonderful Team. Don‚Äôt you think that you will miss us?
Even worse: You leave before finishing the 2-way —Ä–∞–∫–∏—è/beer-pipe between the North of France and Bulgaria. How will you survive ? How will we survive ?
Not to mention the Muscadet-pipe between Nantes and Roubaix!!
Farewell my Friend. You will be missed here, but for sure we will meet again probably in the North of France around a few beers (and a few more, please!)
All the best !

name: Stanislav
message: Thank you for the hard work, good jokes and that you were always positive even when things are going bad. We worked together just a few months but I really appreciate your support and patience. Wish you all the best in what comes next, good luck and everything that you dream of, to become true! I don't want to say goodbye but just see you again. And as always you can contact me if you need help with anything or if you ever visit Bulgaria :D

name: Eric
message: During implementation of this website, Eric was also 404 Not Found. He was so sad that you were leaving, that he had to take some days off.

name: Rositsa
message:
First of all - Rude.
Second of all - How dare you?
Third of all - Who is going to listen to me vent about bugs?
And last but not least - I've worked with hundreds of people over the years and I can honestly say that you were one of them. üòÑ
All jokes aside, thank you for being such an incredible colleague. Your help, patience, and sense of humor made even the toughest problems a little more bearable. I‚Äôve learned a lot from working with you, and I genuinely enjoyed every moment of our collaboration. I wish you nothing but success and exciting challenges. Don‚Äôt be a stranger and remember, if something breaks mysteriously, I‚Äôll still probably think of you first.
Good luck and all the best in what comes next! P.S. Just when I learnt how to pronounce you name correctly..

name: Hamed
message: As I‚Äôve always said, Tu es le best! We didn‚Äôt work together so much at Inensia, but we shared wonderful moments in many places. You have a great ability to combine fun with serious work, and that‚Äôs truly admirable.

name: Petar
message: It was a pleasure working with you, Florent. I'm sure everyone from the team will miss you. Thank you for your hard work, extraordinary positivity and funny jokes. Best of luck on your future endeavors.

name: Stelian
message:
I want to start by thanking you for always being there for us - basically our team‚Äôs unofficial tech support, walking ray of sunshine. I honestly lost count of how many times you helped us, and I‚Äôm still convinced you had some kind of cheat code for staying positive.
I‚Äôve worked with plenty of people on different projects, but you‚Äôre definitely one of the rare ones who made work feel less like‚Ä¶ well, work. A small part of me is still waiting for you to say, "Relax, it‚Äôs just a joke," and show up next year like nothing happened. But since you‚Äôre actually leaving us for real (rude), I want to wish you the best of luck in your new job.
Please don‚Äôt stop being the ridiculously positive, always‚Äëready‚Äëto‚Äëhelp, good‚Äëenergy‚Äëcharging human you are. Your new team has no idea how lucky they are - they‚Äôre basically getting a limited‚Äëedition model.
So good luck on your new adventure. And remember: if you ever miss us, get bored, or realize your new coworkers don‚Äôt laugh at your jokes as much as we did‚Ä¶ just come back. We won‚Äôt even pretend to be surprised.

name: Mario
message:
To start off, thank you for all the help, guidance, and unwavering support throughout the entire Staubli project, Florent! You were truly an invaluable team member and teammate - someone we could always rely on, no matter the challenge. We faced plenty of difficulties along the way, but you consistently found a way to lighten the mood when things got tough. That made a bigger difference than you probably realise. You were like glue that kept the team together.
I‚Äôve learned an incredible amount from you, far more than I could ever count, and those lessons will stay with me well beyond this project. Your professionalism, dedication, and positive attitude set a standard that inspired every one of us. It has been a genuine privilege to work alongside you for so long and to share both the hard-fought victories and the moments of laughter in-between.
Sadly all good things do come to an end, however as a famous quote from The Lord of the Rings reminds us: "The end of one adventure is usually the start of another." I have no doubt that this next chapter will bring new challenges, successes, and opportunities that suit you perfectly.
I wish you nothing but the very best in all your future endeavors. Any team that gets to work with you will be incredibly fortunate just as we were. Hopefully, our paths will cross again someday, but until then, take care, stay well, and keep being the fantastic teammate and person that you are!

name: Ivo
message: Florent, it has been a true pleasure working with you. Your presence in the team was a huge help for me while I was navigating my first real project. Thank you so much for your patience and understanding along the way. I have no doubt you‚Äôll do an amazing job in your new chapter - I‚Äôm betting you‚Äôll even outshine your father‚Äôs success in the insurance business! Best of luck!

name: Tsvetoslava
message:
Thanks for the teamwork and syncs along the way.
Even from a distance, it was great to work this way.
Wishing you success in whatever comes next - 
All the best ahead, and luck with everystep!

name: Georgi
message:
Despite the short time we worked together, I wanted to sincerely thank you for your support and collaboration. I really appreciated your help and that you were always open for a chat.
Wishing you all the best in your next endeavor.

name: Iskren
message: Goodbye Florent, it was great working with you, even for a short time. Thanks for the help, good vibes, and smooth collaboration. Wishing you lots of success and exciting challenges ahead. All the best!
